Notes

A capital "B" has been crossed out in the A-side run-out and a capital "A" on the B-side. Difference vs. the [url=https://www.discogs.com/Tangerine-Dream-Force-Majeure/release/7205540]1979 pressing[/url] is the back cover fine print at the bottom on this one has "Virgin International" on one line and the rest on a second and includes the Jem logotype. The other one has same info in a single line of plain text. [Back cover]: Recorded August/September at Hansa Studios Berlin. © 1979 Virgin Music, Inc. ℗ 1979 Virgin Records
